short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inscribe and store your inscriptions in the world's first Open Source Chrome wallet for Ordinals!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
More decentralized than litescribe wallet, lordinals wallet allows users to pick which api they use. They can use litesscribe api, lordinal api or their own api running from their own litecoin node. This ensures that their blockchain data is not passed to third parties they may or may not trust. 

https://github.com/mavengences/ord-litecoin
